snippet: Mr. Niemeyer, the Brazilian architect, created flowing designs that infused Modernism with a new sensuality and inspired generations of architects worldwide.
abstract: Oscar Niemeyer, celebrated Brazilian architect who designed some of the world's most famous modernist buildings, capturing the imaginations of generations of architects around the world, dies at age 104.

byline.contributor: Simon Romero contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Niemeyer, the Brazilian architect, created flowing designs that infused Modernism with a new sensuality and inspired generations of architects worldwide.

headline.seo: Oscar Niemeyer, Modernist Architect of Brasília, Dies at 104
headline.main: Oscar Niemeyer, Architect Who Gave Brasília Its Flair, Dies at 104
headline.print_headline: Oscar Niemeyer, Architect Who Gave Brasília Its Flair, Dies at 104
